com.netflix.fenzo

Class TaskAssignmentResult

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.netflix.fenzo.TaskAssignmentResult

  • public class TaskAssignmentResult
extends java.lang.Object
    Encapsulates the results of attempting to assign a task to a host.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> getAssignedPorts()
      Returns a list of port numbers corresponding to the ports the task was assigned on the host.
      ConstraintFailure getConstraintFailure()
      Get the ConstraintFailure corresponding to the task constraint that the host failed to meet.
      java.util.List<AssignmentFailure> getFailures()
      Get a list of AssignmentFailures corresponding to the reasons why the assignment of this task to the host did not succeed because of insufficient resources.
      double getFitness()
      Get the result of the fitness calculation applied to this host for this task.
      java.lang.String getHostname()
      Returns the name of the host machine to which this task was attempted to be assigned.
      TaskRequest getRequest()
      Returns the TaskRequest corresponding to the task whose assignment result this is.
      java.lang.String getTaskId()
      Returns the string identifier of the task request for the task whose assignment result this is.
      boolean isSuccessful()
      Indicates whether the assignment of this task to the host succeeded.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • getTaskId

        public java.lang.String getTaskId()
        Returns the string identifier of the task request for the task whose assignment result this is.
        Returns:
        the identifier of the task request

      • getHostname

        public java.lang.String getHostname()
        Returns the name of the host machine to which this task was attempted to be assigned.
        Returns:
        the hostname

      • getAssignedPorts

        public java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> getAssignedPorts()
        Returns a list of port numbers corresponding to the ports the task was assigned on the host.
        Returns:
        a list of port numbers

      • getRequest

        public TaskRequest getRequest()
        Returns the TaskRequest corresponding to the task whose assignment result this is.
        Returns:
        the TaskRequest for this task

      • isSuccessful

        public boolean isSuccessful()
        Indicates whether the assignment of this task to the host succeeded.
        Returns:
        true if this assignment succeeded, false otherwise

      • getFailures

        public java.util.List<AssignmentFailure> getFailures()
        Get a list of AssignmentFailures corresponding to the reasons why the assignment of this task to the host did not succeed because of insufficient resources.
        Returns:
        a list of reasons why the task could not be assigned to the host because of insufficient resources

      • getConstraintFailure

        public ConstraintFailure getConstraintFailure()
        Get the ConstraintFailure corresponding to the task constraint that the host failed to meet.
        Returns:
        information about the constraint that the host failed to satisfy

      • getFitness

        public double getFitness()
        Get the result of the fitness calculation applied to this host for this task.
        Returns:
        a number between 0.0 (indicating that the host is completely unfit for this task) to 1.0 (indicating that the host is a perfect fit for this task)
